thing

Class Computer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • thing.Thing
        • thing.Computer

  • public class Computer
extends Thing
    Models computers in worlds. People may login to computers if in the same room and also control robots via the computer.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Andrew Dallow

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Person loggedOn()
      Person logged on to this computer, null if not in use.
      void logOff()
      Log off the current person on this computer.
      void logon(Person loginID)
      Log a Person on to this computer only if they are in the same room.
      Robot robotControlled()
      get the robot controlled by this computer.
      void setRobotControl(Robot robot)
      set or change robot this computer controls.
      String toString()
      Our own formatted string containing computer details.
